channel.title: Changing Item Color's
channel.description: Hello, i am using the 317 base called "Deathlypvpz v2" and i am trying to add custom item colors, i know that u can change the color in the file with the ints but is there any other way? Also is there a program to make it easier?

item.title: Changing Item Color's

item.description:

Hello, i am using the 317 base called “Deathlypvpz v2” and i am trying to add custom item colors, i know that u can change the color in the file with the ints but is there any other way? Also is there a program to make it easier?
